## About GetAIReply
GetAIReply is a European AI-powered SaaS tool that helps businesses respond to customer reviews on Google, TripAdvisor, Booking.com, Airbnb, Facebook, Yelp, Trustpilot, and TheFork. It generates professional, personalized responses in under 5 seconds.

## Key Features
- AI-powered response generation using Mistral (European AI)
- Automatic sentiment analysis (positive/neutral/negative with score)
- Chrome extension for direct responses on review platforms
- Support for 8+ review platforms and 200+ languages
- Multi-establishment management with easy toggle switching
- Customizable tone (professional, warm, casual)
- Gamification system with levels and badges
- Complete analytics dashboard
- 100% GDPR compliant - data stays in Europe

## Target Users
- Restaurants and cafes
- Hotels and accommodations  
- Retail stores
- Service businesses (plumbers, electricians, hairdressers)
- Real estate agencies
- Healthcare professionals
- Spas and beauty salons
- Any business receiving online reviews

## Pricing
- Free: 5 generations/month, 1 establishment, sentiment analysis included
- Pro: €29/month per establishment - 100 generations/month, multi-establishment, Chrome extension, advanced stats, priority support

## Multi-Establishment Model
Each establishment has its own subscription. Example:
- 1 restaurant (Pro) = €29/month
- 3 restaurants (Pro) = €87/month (3 × €29)
All establishments managed from a single account with easy switching.

## Use Cases
1. Restaurant owner receives negative review about wait time → GetAIReply analyzes sentiment (negative, score 25) and generates apologetic, professional response acknowledging the issue
2. Hotel manager needs to respond to 50+ reviews → Chrome extension enables rapid response directly on Booking.com with sentiment-aware suggestions
3. Small business wants to maintain online reputation → Free tier provides 5 responses/month with full sentiment analysis to get started
4. Multi-location business → Pro subscription per location with unified dashboard
